english.segment1: We were never meant to walk this. road alone. let's begin to stand. in the gap for one another.
english.segment2: Sometimes I wonder if my beating heart has a reason. The thought of breathing only takes my breath away. I've spent so many nights wrestling with this feeling. Do I have the strength to make it through the day. But I was never meant. To walk this road alone. I can always trust you. When you say
english.segment3: I will carry you. Be your strength. And pull you through. Reach for me. And take my hand. We will pray. And we will stand. In a world. Crying out for peace. Let your heart be strong. For when I am weak. You will carry me
english.segment4: Sometimes you wonder if the road you're on has a reason. It's hard to go on when you just don't know. We can shoulder all the weight of life between us. Until the fear of what we cannot see is gone. 'cause we were never meant. To walk this road alone. We are bound together. When we say..
